experience.title: experience
experience.description: With extensive experience in web development, I have honed my technical skills across multiple roles. At Neuropal.in, I developed AI-driven solutions for mental health, enhancing my expertise in AI and web technologies. During my internship at DataCrush Analytics, I contributed to impactful projects like Sajivani Banquet, datacrushanalytics.com and more , collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance websites. At LearnyFox Studio, I specialized in building user-friendly, responsive websites. My technical skills include proficiency in HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, NextJS, MYSQL, Solidity, NodeJS, and Python. Additionally, my interest in Web3 and blockchain technology drives me to explore and innovate in the realm of decentralized technologies.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: I have developed a robust set of hard skills through diverse web development roles. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like ReactJS and NextJS. I am proficient in backend technologies such as NodeJS and databases like MySQL. My experience with Solidity and blockchain technology fuels my interest in Web3, enabling me to contribute to decentralized applications. I am skilled in Python for scripting and AI projects, having developed AI-driven solutions at Neuropal.in. My work emphasizes creating user-friendly, responsive websites, as demonstrated during my tenure at LearnyFox Studio and DataCrush Analytics, where I delivered high-performance web solutions.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: I possess a strong set of soft skills cultivated through various professional experiences. My roles have honed my teamwork and collaboration abilities, particularly in cross-functional settings at DataCrush Analytics and LearnyFox Studio. I excel in problem-solving, demonstrated by developing AI-driven solutions at Neuropal.in and addressing client needs effectively. My communication skills are pivotal in liaising with stakeholders to ensure project alignment and success. I am adaptable, quickly learning new technologies and methodologies to stay current in the fast-evolving tech landscape. My entrepreneurial mindset drives me to innovate continuously, and my passion for technology fuels my proactive approach to tackling challenges and delivering high-quality results.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I'm Adee Shaikh, a 20-year-old Front-end Web Developer and co-founder of Jade Studios. With a passion for Web3, blockchain, and AI, I specialize in creating intuitive web applications that meet client needs. Currently pursuing a BSc in Computer Science, I immerse myself in AI and strive to advance decentralized technologies. My journey into technology began with a fascination for digital innovations, fostering strong problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of client requirements through diverse projects. Certified as a Marketing Insider, I enjoy coding and entrepreneurship, driven by a genuine love for technology and a commitment to innovation.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am deeply passionate about Web3, blockchain, and AI, continually expanding my expertise in these transformative technologies. My interests also encompass web development, where I enjoy creating intuitive, user-centric applications. Additionally, I am fascinated by digital marketing strategies and entrepreneurial ventures, always eager to innovate and explore new opportunities in the tech world.

education.title: education
education.description: I am currently pursuing a BSc in Computer Science at the Ashoka Center for Business and Computer Studies, where I maintain a CGPA of 8.20. My education has provided a strong foundation in artificial intelligence, web development, and blockchain technology. Previously, I completed my HSC at MAC College of Arts Commerce and Science, and my ICSE at Ryan International School, where I developed a keen interest in technology and coding.

files.high-school: I have been in 'Ryan International School'...

sports.title: Reading
sports.description: I have a profound love for reading, whether it's books, articles, or other forms of written content. I am an avid fan of art, appreciating various forms and expressions. Good journalism and quality writing captivate me, and I enjoy exploring diverse topics through these mediums. These interests not only enrich my knowledge but also inspire my creativity and critical thinking.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: I love playing Valorant, immersing myself in its strategic gameplay and dynamic action. Additionally, I've enjoyed playing CS:GO and PUBG, appreciating the competitive nature and teamwork involved in these games. These experiences not only provide entertainment but also enhance my strategic thinking and collaborative skills.
